Job Title: Project Management with ServiceNow implementation experience Location: Richmond, VA (Work from Office)Duration: Long Term Contract Responsibilities:1. Project Planning and Management: Lead the planning and execution of ServiceNow projects from inception to completion. - Define project scope, objectives, and deliverables that support business goals in collaboration with senior management and stakeholders. - Develop detailed project plans, schedules, and resource allocation. - Manage project risks, issues, and changes to ensure successful delivery.2. Stakeholder Management: Act as the main point of contact between stakeholders and the project team. - Facilitate regular meetings and communications with stakeholders to report on project status, risks, and issues. - Ensure alignment between project objectives and business needs.3. Team Leadership: Lead, coach, and mentor project team members, including business analysts, developers, testers, and other project staff. - Foster a collaborative and high-performance team environment. - Manage third-party vendors and consultants as required.4. Budget and Resource Management: Manage project budgets, ensuring projects are delivered within approved financial limits. - Allocate resources effectively to meet project objectives and timelines. - Track project costs and report on financial performance against budgets.5. Quality Assurance: Ensure that project deliverables meet quality standards and are delivered on time. - Implement best practices and methodologies for ServiceNow project management. - Conduct project reviews and lessons learned sessions post-delivery.6. Reporting and Documentation: Prepare and deliver project status reports, including progress, risks, and issues.- Maintain comprehensive project documentation throughout the project lifecycle. - Ensure proper handover of completed projects to operations and support teams.
